Articles.Content:
Hi there, playing on a slightly modified version of KSP 1.11 and I just discovered a huge problem. When I go EVA with my kerbals and turn on their thrusters they refuse to "stabilise". No matter what I do they keep spinning and controls are set to their horizon. Flying in this state is pretty much impossible and almost killed few of my kerbals.

Thanks for any help

I cant say much without a mod list, But id assume either your camera is broken (press c while on eva to fix), or you have a large craft.
For both options there are many solutions, but the simplest one is just to use timewarp (which kills the rotation).
